fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Make someone angry, giving their ability a Rampaging effect.
- Make someone seethe and mald, their abilities will now always rampage on full moons. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may Self-target with your first ability, you may not Self-target with your second one.
- Your target will not recieve extra feedback caused by their ability rampaging, but you will recieve it.
- You secretly need 3 less votes to be lynched.
